casebody.data:
Plumes — Argued September 19, Madden — Argued October 30, Apodaca — Argued November 24, Cooper, Jr. — Submitted on record and briefs November 5, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. JOHN LEON PLUMES, Appellant. (Case Nos. 87939, 87940, 87941) 462 P. 2d 691 Michael E. Murphy, Deputy District Attorney, Eugene, argued the cause and filed the brief for respondent. With him on the brief was John B. Leahy, District Attorney, Eugene.
